scripts-descriptions.test:coverage: Runs all PHPUnit tests, writes HTML results in TestDox format to `reports/result.html` file and code coverage report to `reports/coverage` directory.
scripts-descriptions.test:unit: Runs all PHPUnit tests without code coverage report.
scripts-descriptions.test:mutation: Runs mutation testing with Infection library.
scripts-descriptions.test:codesniffer:full: Runs PHP_CodeSniffer to detect violations of PSR12 coding standard and prints full report.
scripts-descriptions.test:codesniffer:summary: Runs PHP_CodeSniffer to detect violations of PSR12 coding standard and prints summary report.
scripts-descriptions.test:codesniffer:fix: Runs PHP_CodeSniffer to automagically correct violations of PSR12 coding standard.
